panels.description:
It uses multiple data sources from PLS Admin, such as:
- Prometheus from validator monitoring
- PostgreSQL - using periodic tasks to populate tables about price, wallet and withdrawal changes
- InfluxDB - using HW performance related data

options.content:
# Validator Stats

Shows validator performance, wallet balance and other related information.

---

## ${days_of_data} days of available data.

## ${validator_count} validators monitored

---

_Using "${my_timezone}" for queries._


---

panels.title: Validator Stats

panels.description: Sums all withdrawals found in the last hour and calculates USD

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
SUM(amount*$pls_precision) as value FROM pls_validator_withdrawals  where address = '$pls_wallet'
AND
 "timeStamp" BETWEEN (SELECT MAX("timeStamp") - INTERVAL '1 hour' FROM pls_validator_withdrawals) AND (SELECT MAX("timeStamp") FROM pls_validator_withdrawals)
 AND "validatorIndex" IN ($validator_list)

panels.title: Last Hour

panels.description: Sums all withdrawals found in the last day and calculates USD

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
SUM(amount*$pls_precision) as value FROM pls_validator_withdrawals  where address = '$pls_wallet'
AND
 "timeStamp" BETWEEN (SELECT MAX("timeStamp") - INTERVAL '1 day' FROM pls_validator_withdrawals) AND (SELECT MAX("timeStamp") FROM pls_validator_withdrawals)
 AND "validatorIndex" IN ($validator_list)

panels.title: Last day

panels.description: Price history, it depens on API access

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "date" at time zone '$my_timezone' as date,
  "priceUSD"
FROM
  pls_price

panels.title: Price History

panels.description:
It shows all time data:
Sum of all PLS rewards(total) since starting
It's value in current USD price
Current USD price for reference
And APR calculated from the last week. (If there's no a week of data, it will not show this)

targets.rawSql: SELECT SUM(amount)  * $pls_precision as PLS  FROM pls_validator_withdrawals where address = '$pls_wallet'
SELECT SUM(amount) * $pls_price * $pls_precision as USD FROM pls_validator_withdrawals where address = '$pls_wallet'
SELECT "priceUSD" FROM pls_price ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT ((SUM(amount) * $pls_precision) * 52 / ($validator_count * $validator_deposit) * $enough_data) as "APR"
FROM pls_validator_withdrawals
WHERE 
address = '$pls_wallet'
AND 
 "timeStamp" BETWEEN (SELECT MAX("timeStamp") - INTERVAL '7 days' FROM pls_validator_withdrawals) AND (SELECT MAX("timeStamp") FROM pls_validator_withdrawals);

SELECT (SUM(pls_payable_amount) * $pls_precision) as "Share Pending"
FROM pls_share
WHERE 
pls_wallet_payer = '$pls_wallet'
AND 
 paid = False

SELECT (SUM(pls_payable_amount) * $pls_precision) as "Share Paid"
FROM pls_share
WHERE 
pls_wallet_payer = '$pls_wallet'
AND 
 paid = True

panels.title: All Time

panels.description: Address balance in PLS doesn't include ERC20, ERC721, ERC1155 tokens).

targets.rawSql: SELECT balance * 1E-18 as PLS FROM pls_wallets where address = '$pls_wallet'
SELECT balance * 1E-18 * $pls_price as USD FROM pls_wallets where address = '$pls_wallet'

panels.title: Wallet Balance

panels.description: Address balance in PLS doesn't include ERC20, ERC721, ERC1155 tokens).

targets.rawSql: SELECT date at time zone '$my_timezone' as date, balance * 1E-18 as value FROM pls_wallet_history where address = '$pls_wallet'

panels.title: Wallet Balance History

panels.description: Sums all withdrawals found in the last week and calculates USD

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
SUM(amount*$pls_precision) as value FROM pls_validator_withdrawals  where address = '$pls_wallet'
AND
 "timeStamp" BETWEEN (SELECT MAX("timeStamp") - INTERVAL '7 days' FROM pls_validator_withdrawals) AND (SELECT MAX("timeStamp") FROM pls_validator_withdrawals)
 AND "validatorIndex" IN ($validator_list)

panels.title: Last week

panels.description: Sums all withdrawals found in the last 30 days(month) and calculates USD

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
SUM(amount*$pls_precision) as value FROM pls_validator_withdrawals  where address = '$pls_wallet'
AND
 "timeStamp" BETWEEN (SELECT MAX("timeStamp") - INTERVAL '30 days' FROM pls_validator_withdrawals) AND (SELECT MAX("timeStamp") FROM pls_validator_withdrawals)
 AND "validatorIndex" IN ($validator_list)

panels.title: Last Month

panels.description: Shows validator balance as a graphic for all validators owned by selected wallet.
panels.title: Validator balance

panels.description: Total balance between all validators owned by the selected wallet.  It should be something near the boundaries of over 32M*qty of validators for the selected wallet.
panels.title: Total balance

panels.description:
This shows a bar graph to see the performance of withdrawals for the last 24hours per hour.

Since withdrawals could be made at any time, some times(hours) could be skipped.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
$__timeGroupAlias("timeStamp", '1h'), 
sum(amount * $pls_precision) as PLS
FROM pls_validator_withdrawals
WHERE address = '$pls_wallet'
AND 
$__timeFilter("timeStamp") 
AND "validatorIndex" IN ($validator_list)
group by 1
order by 1

SELECT 
$__timeGroupAlias("timeStamp", '1h'), 
sum(amount * $pls_precision * $pls_price) as USD
FROM pls_validator_withdrawals
WHERE address = '$pls_wallet'
AND 
$__timeFilter("timeStamp") 
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Validator Rewards

panels.description: This shows a bar graph to see the performance of withdrawals for the last week per day.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
$__timeGroupAlias("timeStamp", '1d'), 
sum(amount * $pls_precision) as PLS
FROM pls_validator_withdrawals
WHERE address = '$pls_wallet'
AND 
$__timeFilter("timeStamp") 
AND "validatorIndex" IN ($validator_list)
group by 1
order by 1

SELECT 
$__timeGroupAlias("timeStamp", '1d'), 
sum(amount * $pls_precision * $pls_price) as USD
FROM pls_validator_withdrawals
WHERE address = '$pls_wallet'
AND 
$__timeFilter("timeStamp") 
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Validator Rewards

panels.description: This shows a bar graph to see the performance of withdrawals for the last month(30 days) per week.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
$__timeGroupAlias("timeStamp", '1w'), 
sum(amount * $pls_precision) as PLS
FROM pls_validator_withdrawals
WHERE address = '$pls_wallet'
AND 
$__timeFilter("timeStamp") 
AND "validatorIndex" IN ($validator_list)
group by 1
order by 1

SELECT 
$__timeGroupAlias("timeStamp", '1w'), 
sum(amount * $pls_precision * $pls_price) as USD
FROM pls_validator_withdrawals
WHERE address = '$pls_wallet'
AND 
$__timeFilter("timeStamp") 
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Validator Rewards

panels.description: Shows all withdrawals performed on the last year for the selected wallet

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
"timeStamp" at time zone '$my_timezone' as "timeStamp", 
"index",
"blockNumber", 
"validatorIndex",
amount * $pls_precision as PLS, 
amount * $pls_precision * $pls_price as USD,
"priceUSD" as "$ at W"
FROM pls_validator_withdrawals
WHERE address = '$pls_wallet'
AND "validatorIndex" IN ($validator_list)
order by 2 desc

panels.title: Withdrawals

panels.description: Shows total PLS generated for each validator owned by selected wallet

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
"validatorIndex", 
sum(amount * $pls_precision) as PLS, 
sum(amount * $pls_precision * $pls_price) as USD
FROM pls_validator_withdrawals WHERE address = '$pls_wallet'
AND "validatorIndex" IN ($validator_list)
group by 1
order by 1 asc

panels.title: Validator PLS generation

panels.description: Shows all share requests made by maintainer for selected wallet. It shows when it was requested and if it has been paid.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT share_sequence as "Sequence", "timeStamp" as "Request Date" ,pls_wihdrawed * $pls_precision as "Earned", pls_payable_amount * $pls_precision as "Payable Share", paid as "Is paid?"
FROM pls_share
WHERE 
pls_wallet_payer = '$pls_wallet'

panels.title: Share Payable Status

panels.description: This panel will count only the votes done since your validator process started
panels.title: Validator vote summary

panels.description: Shows last hour movements in blocks of 5 minutes for all validators owned by selected address.
panels.title: 5m movements in last hour

panels.description: Get's last block chain from node and shows it's against the last checked block on the scheduler - This is used to know how much our data is up to date.

targets.rawSql: SELECT blockheight FROM pls_block_explorer ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1

panels.title: Current/Checked Height

panels.description: This panel won't have consistant values during the first hour of the node started process
panels.title: Hourly log type counter

panels.description: Average validator count in the PLS Network
panels.title: Avg. Validator Count

panels.description: This triggers when the process is down (not reporting "up")
panels.title: Alert: Process down

panels.description: Allows triggering alerts when error or warn thresholds are reached.
panels.title: Alert: ${threshold_err} errors  or ${threshold_warn} warns  in 1h

panels.description:
This alert is useful only for people who has automatic restart of the process after crash. 
This can be made for example by using the prysm.bat file on windows with "set PRYSM_AUTORESTART=true&", or with docker with "--restart always"
panels.title: Warn: The process just restarted

panels.description: Average active validators in the PLS network
panels.title: Avg. Active Validators

list.definition: select owner as __text , address as __value from pls_wallets
list.label: Wallet Owner
list.name: pls_wallet
list.query: select owner as __text , address as __value from pls_wallets

list.definition: select "priceUSD" from pls_price order by "date" desc limit(1)
list.label: pls_price
list.name: pls_price
list.query: select "priceUSD" from pls_price order by "date" desc limit(1)

list.definition:
select
distinct "validatorIndex"
from 
pls_validator_withdrawals
where
"address" = '${pls_wallet}'
order by 1
list.label: Validator
list.name: validator_list
list.query:
select
distinct "validatorIndex"
from 
pls_validator_withdrawals
where
"address" = '${pls_wallet}'
order by 1

list.definition:
select
extract(
day  from
(Max("timeStamp") - Min("timeStamp")))::integer
from 
pls_validator_withdrawals
where
"address" = '${pls_wallet}'
list.name: days_of_data
list.query:
select
extract(
day  from
(Max("timeStamp") - Min("timeStamp")))::integer
from 
pls_validator_withdrawals
where
"address" = '${pls_wallet}'

list.definition:
select
((extract(
day  from
(Max("timeStamp") - Min("timeStamp")))::integer)>7) ::integer
from 
pls_validator_withdrawals
where
"address" = '${pls_wallet}'
list.name: enough_data
list.query:
select
((extract(
day  from
(Max("timeStamp") - Min("timeStamp")))::integer)>7) ::integer
from 
pls_validator_withdrawals
where
"address" = '${pls_wallet}'

list.description: How many errors before triggering an alarm
list.name: threshold_err

list.description: How many warnings before triggering an alarm
list.name: threshold_warn
